fields.name: Grappler
fields.desc: You've developed the skills necessary to hold your own in close-quarters grappling. You gain the following benefits:
fields.effects_desc_json: ["You have advantage on attack rolls against a creature you are grappling.", "You can use your action to try to pin a creature grappled by you. The creature makes a Strength or Dexterity saving throw against your maneuver DC. On a failure, you and the creature are both restrained until the grapple ends."]
